Segment.name: PSD
Segment.comment: To define the physical sample parameters associated with a test resulting in discrete measurements

Field.name: SampleProcessStatusCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the stage in the product development cycle at which the specimen was selected for testing

Field.name: SampleSelectionMethodCode
Field.comment: Code denoting the method of selecting the specimen

Field.name: CompositeUnitOfMeasure
Field.comment: To identify a composite unit of measure (See Figures Appendix for examples of use)

Field.name: SampleDescriptionCode
Field.comment: Code describing the physical configuration or condition of the test specimen

Field.name: SampleDirectionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the direction in which the sample was collected or tested

Field.name: PositionCode
Field.comment: Code specifying the position of an item such as the location, within a specimen, from which the sample was taken; the position of a coupon within an advertisement; etc

Field.name: Description
Field.comment: A free-form description to clarify the related data elements and their content

Field.name: SampleSelectionModulus
Field.comment: To specify the sampling frequency in terms of a modulus of the Unit of Measure, e.g., every fifth bag, every 1.5 minutes

SyntaxNote.name: P0304
SyntaxNote.comment: If either PSD03 or PSD04 is present, then the other is required.

SyntaxNote.name: E0309
SyntaxNote.comment: Only one of PSD03 or PSD09 may be present.
